Question: Home is $600$ metres from Bus Stop. Playground is $750$ metres from Home. Assuming Home and Playground are in the opposite direction from Bus Stop which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Playground is nearer to Bus Stop than Home
Wrong_Answer_1: Home is nearer to Playground than Bus Stop
Wrong_Answer_2: Bus Stop is at same distance from Home and Playground
Wrong_Answer_3: Home is nearer to Bus Stop than Playground
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Bus Stop and Home be $x$, and the distance between Home and Playground be $y$.
Here $x=$$600$$m$ and $y=$$750$$m$.
Home---$600$$m$--->Bus Stop
Home-----$750$$m$----->Playground
Distance between Bus Stop and Playground $= $$750$$-$$600$$ = $$150$$m$    ...([distance between Home & Playground] $-$ [distance between Bus Stop & Home])
Home---$600$$m$--->Bus Stop---$150$$m$--->Playground
As we can see that the distance between Bus Stop and Home is $600$$m$, and the distance between Bus Stop and Playground is $150$$m$.
Since the distance between Bus Stop and Playground $<$ distance between Bus Stop and Home
Playground is nearer to Bus Stop than Home

Question: Playground is $500$ metres from Medicine Shop. Factory is $550$ metres from Playground. Assuming Playground and Factory are in the opposite direction from Medicine Shop which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Factory is nearer to Medicine Shop than Playground
Wrong_Answer_1: Playground is nearer to Factory than Medicine Shop
Wrong_Answer_2: Playground is nearer to Medicine Shop than Factory
Wrong_Answer_3: Medicine Shop is at same distance from Playground and Factory
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Medicine Shop and Playground be $x$, and the distance between Playground and Factory be $y$.
Here $x=$$500$$m$ and $y=$$550$$m$.
Playground---$500$$m$--->Medicine Shop
Playground-----$550$$m$----->Factory
Distance between Medicine Shop and Factory $= $$550$$-$$500$$ = $$50$$m$    ...([distance between Playground & Factory] $-$ [distance between Medicine Shop & Playground])
Playground---$500$$m$--->Medicine Shop---$50$$m$--->Factory
As we can see that the distance between Medicine Shop and Playground is $500$$m$, and the distance between Medicine Shop and Factory is $50$$m$.
Since the distance between Medicine Shop and Factory $<$ distance between Medicine Shop and Playground
Factory is nearer to Medicine Shop than Playground

Question: Petrol Pump is $450$ metres from Factory. Hospital is $900$ metres from Petrol Pump. Assuming Petrol Pump and Hospital are in the opposite direction from Factory which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Factory is at same distance from Petrol Pump and Hospital
Wrong_Answer_1: Petrol Pump is nearer to Factory than Hospital
Wrong_Answer_2: Hospital is nearer to Factory than Petrol Pump
Wrong_Answer_3: Petrol Pump is nearer to Hospital than Factory
Solution_text:
Let the distance between Factory and Petrol Pump be $x$, and the distance between Petrol Pump and Hospital be $y$.
Here $x=$$450$$m$ and $y=$$900$$m$.
Petrol Pump---$450$$m$--->Factory
Petrol Pump-----$900$$m$----->Hospital
Distance between Factory and Hospital $= $$900$$-$$450$$ = $$450$$m$    ...([distance between Petrol Pump & Hospital] $-$ [distance between Factory & Petrol Pump])
Petrol Pump---$450$$m$--->Factory---$450$$m$--->Hospital
As we can see that the distance between Factory and Petrol Pump is $450$$m$, and the distance between Factory and Hospital is also $450$$m$.
Factory is at same distance from Petrol Pump and Hospital

Wrong_Answer_3: Police Station is nearer to Salon than Bus Stop

Police Station---$800$$m$--->Salon
Police Station-----$900$$m$----->Bus Stop

Question: Mall is $400$ metres from Office. Bus Stop is $900$ metres from Mall. Assuming Mall and Bus Stop are in the opposite direction from Office which of the following statement is correct?
Correct_Answer_1: Mall is nearer to Office than Bus Stop
